content: **crocheted easter bunny in drops merino extra fine theme easter ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-179 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the piece measures approx width = 5 cm = 2 length = 10 cm = 4 **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g color 08 light beige or 50 g color 01 off white or 50 g color 16 light pink **crochet gauge ** 22 single crochets in width and 22 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm = us c hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
